p:properties.name: Custom License Validation
p:properties.p:documentation: This example adds keyGenValidation=new com.company.product.keygen.Main.NoLicenseValidation() and keyMgrValidation=new com.company.product.keymgr.Main.NoLicenseValidation() to the Basic Configuration example in order to decorate the basic license validation function in the Key Generator and Key Manager modules with the named custom class.
